short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Vault-like protection for passwords and sensitive data across all your devices.
short.cs: Ochrana hesel a citlivých dat ve všech zařízeních jako v trezoru.
short.de: Geräteübergreifender Tresor für Ihre Passwörter und sensiblen Daten.
short.el: Bitdefender SecurePass, ukládajte Vaše hesla bezpečně.
short.es: Férrea protección para contraseñas y datos sensibles en todos sus dispositivos.
short.fr: Protection de type coffre-fort pour vos mots de passe et données sensibles.
short.hu: Mint egy széfben: a jelszavak és érzékeny adatok védelme az összes eszközödön.
short.it: Una protezione sicura per password e dati sensibili su tutti i tuoi dispositivi.
short.ja: すべてのデバイスで、パスワードや機密データを「金庫」のように保護
short.ko: 모든 기기에서 비밀번호와 중요한 데이터를 안전 금고처럼 보호합니다.
short.nl: Kluisbeveiliging van wachtwoorden en gevoelige gegevens op al uw apparaten.
short.pl: Podobna do sejfu ochrona haseł i poufnych danych na wszystkich urządzeniach.
short.pt_BR: Proteção feito cofre para senhas e dados sensíveis em todos os dispositivos.
short.pt_PT: Como um cofre de palavras-passe e dados sensíveis em todos os dispositivos.
short.ro: Protecție solidă pentru parole și date sensibile pe toate dispozitivele tale.
short.ru: Защита для паролей и конфиденциальных данных на всех ваших устройствах.
short.sv: Valvliknande skydd för lösenord och känsliga data på alla dina enheter.
short.th: การป้องกันเหมือนห้องนิรภัยสำหรับรหัสผ่านและข้อมูลละเอียดอ่อนในทุกอุปกรณ์ของคุณ
short.tr: Tüm cihazlarınızdaki şifreler ve hassas veriler için kasa benzeri koruma.
short.vi: Bảo vệ như hầm két cho mật khẩu và dữ liệu nhạy cảm trên mọi thiết bị của bạn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Bitdefender SecurePass is the ultra-secure password manager service built on top of Bitdefender's long history of elite detection, protection, performance, ease of use and unique user experience.


Forget about using the same five passwords over and over again. Forget about the need to constantly come up with new and strong options. Forget about having to remember which password goes with which account.


Bitdefender SecurePass gives you end-to-end data encryption. We help keep your passwords safe and your mind free from password clutter.
long.cs,de,es,fr,it,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,sv:
Loki Password Manager is the ultra-secure password manager service built on top of Bitdefender’s long history of elite detection, protection, performance, ease of use and unique user experience.


Forget about using the same five passwords over and over again. Forget about the need to constantly come up with new and strong options. Forget about having to remember which password goes with which account.


Loki Password Manager gives you end-to-end data encryption. We help keep your passwords safe and your mind free from password clutter.
